data.title: A Perfect Song for Easter!
data.meta_description: For Christians, according to The New Testament, Easter celebrates the resurrection of Jesus Christ. In the song Troublemaker, first made famous by Willie Nelson in 1976 with his groundbreaking album Troublemaker, a contemporary view is blended with the story of Jesus’ crucifixion.       Listen to Troublemaker from Peace in the Valley: Willie Nelson Peace […]
data.text:
Promised Land Music was established in 1994 in Nashville, TN as the record label for Willie Nelson Peace In The Valley. After 20 years Promised Land Music has been revived and revitalized internally and thru several key partnerships in music studio production, video & film production, and distribution of music and entertainment.

More music and artists will soon be added to the Promised Land Music roster.

Spiritual Music from The HeartLand
